plot: A documentary on Levon Helm, a founding member of The Band, at home in Woodstock in the midst of creating his first studio album in 25 years.
title: Ain't in It for My Health: A Film About Levon Helm
plot_es: A documentary on Levon Helm, a founding member of The Band, at home in Woodstock in the midst of creating his first studio album in 25 years.
original_name: Ain't in It for My Health: A Film About Levon Helm
plot_en: A documentary on Levon Helm, a founding member of The Band, at home in Woodstock in the midst of creating his first studio album in 25 years.
